CustomField.formula: CASE(TIG_Entity__c, 'TIG India', 'TICL/2017-18/'+ SUBSTITUTE(Name, 'I-0', ''), 'TIG UK', 'HCT'+ SUBSTITUTE(Name, 'I-', ''), 'TIG Malasiya', SUBSTITUTE(Name, 'I-', '') , 'TIG Australia', 'INV-'+ Customer__r.Trade_Name__c + SUBSTITUTE(Name, 'I-', ''), 'E')
CustomField.label: Invoice Series
